text: Mountain View is a suburb of Johannesburg, South Africa. It is located in Region E of the City of Johannesburg Metropolitan Municipality. ==History== The suburb is situated on part of an old Witwatersrand farm called Klipfontein. It was established in 1902 and was named because of it view of the northern Magaliesberg mountains. ==References== Category:Johannesburg Region E
title: Mountain View, Johannesburg
